ai-patthana16.16:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.16:1.1_0: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a good principle.
ai-patthana16.16:1.1_1: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a good principle.
ai-patthana16.16:1.1_2: A wholesome mind doesn’t give rise to a good thought. Avoiding the reason for the sake of their mind.
ai-patthana16.16:1.1_3: A skillful person’s mind is not skilled in thought and not in mind, and they don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.16:1.1_4: A skillful person’s mind is not skilled in thought and not in mind, nor are there five things for them.
ai-patthana16.16:2.1_0: A unskillful thought doesn’t give rise to the unskillful. Avoiding the skill in mind.
ai-patthana16.16:2.1_1: A unskillful thought doesn’t give rise to the unskillful, with mind as condition: gives rise to the cause,
ai-patthana16.16:2.1_2: An unwholesome mind doesn’t give rise to a thought with intent on thought.
ai-patthana16.16:2.1_3: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to unskillful qualities, and they don’t arise because of their mind.
ai-patthana16.16:2.1_4: Unskillful thoughts don’t arise in their mind, and because of their mind is unskillful and no cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.16:3.1_0: Avoiding a thought with indeterminate mind. An astute person doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.16:3.1_1: Avoiding a thought with indeterminate mind. An astute person doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.16:3.1_2: Not attending on a thought with mind. Their mind doesn’t give rise to the unskillful qualities that arise with a reason. These three things don’t arise because of cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.16:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.16:5.1_0: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to a good thought. Then they don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.16:5.1_1: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to a good thought. ...
ai-patthana16.16:5.1_2: skillful qualities don’t arise in a good thought. They’re not skilled in the mind, and they don’t have any cause or reason for these three reasons.
ai-patthana16.16:8.1_0: the result of nine prominent speech ...
